segment.source: By deleting your user account, you will permanently lose all data, including access to organization projects and their associated events.
segment.target: Ved å slette brukerkontoen din vil du permanent miste all data, inkludert tilgang til organisasjonsprosjekter og deres tilhørende hendelser.

segment.source: Make sure to delete or transfer ownership of any organizations before deleting your account. Owners of paid organization subscriptions are not able to delete their account.
segment.target: Pass på å slette eller overføre eierskap for alle organisasjoner før du sletter kontoen din. Eiere av abonnementstjenester kan ikke slette kontoen sin.

segment.source: Authentication tokens give you access to the GlitchTip API. You can create these tokens as authentication to gain specific access around the app.
segment.target: Auth tokens gir deg tilgang til GlitchTip APIet. Du kan benytte disse til å gi forskjellige og tilpassede tilganger i applikasjonen.

segment.source: Once you create a token, it will show up here.
segment.target: Når du har laget et token vil det vises her.

segment.source: There are no releases for this organization.
segment.target: Det er ingen utgivelser for denne organisasjonen.

segment.source: To continue, you must either log in to your existing account, or create a new one.
segment.target: For å fortsette må du enten logge inn med en eksisterende konto, eller lage en ny.

segment.source: There was an error connecting to your social authentication provider.
segment.target: Det oppsto en feil ved tilkobling til ekstern autentiseringstilbyder.

segment.source: No user reports have been submitted.
segment.target: Ingen rapporter har blitt sendt inn av brukere.

segment.source: To enable user reports, take a look at `showReportDialog` in the JS SDK.
segment.target: For å benytte brukerrapporter, ta en titt på `showReportDialog` i JS SDK.

segment.source: Plug in your security key and follow the prompt from your browser to finish logging in.
segment.target: Koble til din sikkerhetsnøkkel og følg instruksjonene i nettleseren din for å fullføre innloggingen.

segment.source: Log in with authenticator app instead
segment.target: Logg inn med autentiserings-app i stedet

segment.source: Enter the code from the authenticator app on your mobile device. If you’ve lost your device, you may enter one of your recovery codes.
segment.target: Skriv inn koden fra autentiserings-appen på telefonen din. Hvis du har mistet telefonen, skriv inn en av gjenopprettingskodene.

segment.source: Code must be of length 6 or 16
segment.target: Koden må være 6 eller 16 tegn lang

segment.source: Log in with security key instead
segment.target: Logg inn med sikkerhetsnøkkel i stedet

segment.source: Your email is required to log in
segment.target: Epost er påkrevd for å logge inn

segment.source: Your password should be at least 8 characters long
segment.target: Passordet bør være på minst åtte tegn

segment.source: Your password is required to log in
segment.target: Passord er påkrevd for å logge inn

segment.source: This is the first step to get started with GlitchTip.
segment.target: Dette er første steg for å komme i gang med GlitchTip.

segment.source: Organization creation has been disabled on this instance of GlitchTip. Contact an administrator to be invited into an existing organization.
segment.target: Registrering er deaktivert. Kontakt en administrator for å bli invitert til en eksisterende organisasjon.

segment.source: Once you have the app running, proceed to the next step.
segment.target: Når applikasjonen kjører, fortsett til neste trinn.

segment.source: This alert isn't being sent anywhere. Select "Add An Alert Recipient" below to get started.
segment.target: Dette varselet sendes ingen steder. Velg "Legg til en varselmottaker" under for å komme i gang.

segment.source: Send an email to team members on this project.
segment.target: Send en epost til gruppemedlemmer på dette prosjektet.

segment.source: You don't have any alerts set up. Click "Create New Alert" on the top right of this card to get started.
segment.target: Du har ikke konfigurert noen varsler. Klikk "Opprett nytt varsel" øverst til høyre for å komme i gang.

segment.source: TOTP authentication is currently enabled on your account.
segment.target: TOTP-autentisering er aktivert for din konto

segment.source: Make your account more secure by requiring a time-based one time password (TOTP) code after you log in.
segment.target: Øk sikkerheten for din konto ved å benytte et tidsbegrenset engangspassord (TOTP) sammen med innlogging.

segment.source: or your favorite TOTP app on your mobile device
segment.target: eller din foretrukne TOTP-applikasjon på din telefon

segment.source: Scan the QR Code in your authenticator app or enter the code below:
segment.target: Scan QR-koden i autentiserings-appen eller skriv inn koden under:

segment.source: Enter a six-digit password generated by your authenticator app and submit this form to enable TOTP authentication:
segment.target: Skriv inn det sekssifrede passordet generert av din autentiserings-app og send inn for å aktivere TOTP-autentisering:

segment.source: There was an error processing your request
segment.target: There was an error processing your request

segment.source: There were errors while processing your request
segment.target: There were errors while processing your request

segment.source: To add a project to this organization, press the "Add Project" button.
segment.target: To add a project to this organization, press the "Add Project" button.

segment.source: You can't see issues for this project because you're not on the team.
segment.target: You can't see issues for this project because you're not on the team.

segment.source: Out of the projects you have selected, you are not a part of that project's team for at least one of them.
segment.target: Out of the projects you have selected, you are not a part of that project's team for at least one of them.

segment.source: If you go to this project's settings page, you can pick a platform. If you do, you'll get more specific instructions about how to get started.
segment.target: If you go to this project's settings page, you can pick a platform. If you do, you'll get more specific instructions about how to get started.

segment.source: Most instructions will have a spot that says "your DSN here". Copy the DSN and paste it into that spot.
segment.target: Most instructions will have a spot that says "your DSN here". Copy the DSN and paste it into that spot.

segment.source: This page is showing instructions on how to connect GlitchTip to your project based on the platform you specified.
segment.target: This page is showing instructions on how to connect GlitchTip to your project based on the platform you specified.

segment.source: Try changing your search parameters to get something to show here.
segment.target: Try changing your search parameters to get something to show here.

segment.source: You have multiple projects selected. Select a single project to learn more about why there's nothing here.
segment.target: You have multiple projects selected. Select a single project to learn more about why there's nothing here.

segment.source: Because you are an admin for , you have access to all of its projects. However, if you want to view issues for , you must be a member of one of its teams.
segment.target: Because you are an admin for , you have access to all of its projects. However, if you want to view issues for , you must be a member of one of its teams.

segment.source: Data Source Name: The code that connects your project to GlitchTip. Install a library into your project, then configure it with the DSN so that it knows how to send errors to your GlitchTip account.
segment.target: Data Source Name: The code that connects your project to GlitchTip. Install a library into your project, then configure it with the DSN so that it knows how to send errors to your GlitchTip account.

segment.source: Edit whether or not you want to receive notifications for this project
segment.target: Edit whether or not you want to receive notifications for this project

segment.source: By deleting your project, you will lose all associated data. This cannot be undone.
segment.target: By deleting your project, you will lose all associated data. This cannot be undone.

segment.source: Events are the unit of measure for tracking GlitchTip usage. An organization's maximum number of events per month is determined by its subscription type. Events are used to measure four GlitchTip features:
segment.target: Events are the unit of measure for tracking GlitchTip usage. An organization's maximum number of events per month is determined by its subscription type. Events are used to measure four GlitchTip features:

segment.source: Issues: Each occurrence of an event reported to GlitchTip
segment.target: Issues: Each occurrence of an event reported to GlitchTip

segment.source: Performance: Each time your app sends GlitchTip a transaction report for a tracked activity on your app
segment.target: Performance: Each time your app sends GlitchTip a transaction report for a tracked activity on your app

segment.source: Releases: Each megabyte of file storage is counted as an event
segment.target: Releases: Each megabyte of file storage is counted as an event

segment.source: To add a project to this organization, press the "Create New Project" button.
segment.target: To add a project to this organization, press the "Create New Project" button.

segment.source: In order to use GlitchTip, you'll need to create an organization.
segment.target: In order to use GlitchTip, you'll need to create an organization.

segment.source: Questions about subscriptions? Need assistance, or a bigger plan? Contact us at .
segment.target: Questions about subscriptions? Need assistance, or a bigger plan? Contact us at .

segment.source: You have selected the free plan. Please consider making a monthly donation to help keep open source development sustainable. Thank you for choosing GlitchTip!
segment.target: You have selected the free plan. Please consider making a monthly donation to help keep open source development sustainable. Thank you for choosing GlitchTip!

segment.source: This organization has an active subscription to GlitchTip. Thank you!
segment.target: This organization has an active subscription to GlitchTip. Thank you!

segment.source: This organization has a trial subscription to GlitchTip.
segment.target: This organization has a trial subscription to GlitchTip.

segment.source: This organization has a subscription to GlitchTip, but the payment is past due.
segment.target: This organization has a subscription to GlitchTip, but the payment is past due.

segment.source: Total events used in billing period:
segment.target: Total events used in billing period:

segment.source: If you have questions about your subscription, please contact us at .
segment.target: If you have questions about your subscription, please contact us at .

segment.source: This organization does not have an active subscription to GlitchTip. Pick a plan to get started.
segment.target: This organization does not have an active subscription to GlitchTip. Pick a plan to get started.

segment.source: Now that you have an organization and a subscription, create a project.
segment.target: Now that you have an organization and a subscription, create a project.

segment.source: Your team slug can only consist of letters, numbers, underscores and/or hyphens.
segment.target: Your team slug can only consist of letters, numbers, underscores and/or hyphens.

segment.source: Enter a valid slug to create a team
segment.target: Enter a valid slug to create a team

segment.source: This team doesn't have any members
segment.target: This team doesn't have any members

segment.source: This team doesn't have any projects
segment.target: This team doesn't have any projects

segment.source: By deleting your team, you will lose all associated data. This cannot be undone.
segment.target: By deleting your team, you will lose all associated data. This cannot be undone.

segment.source: Teams are for managing issue notifications and workflow. View permissions are handled through organization membership.
segment.target: Teams are for managing issue notifications and workflow. View permissions are handled through organization membership.

segment.source: You aren't part of any teams. Join a team below or press the "Create Team" button in the upper right.
segment.target: You aren't part of any teams. Join a team below or press the "Create Team" button in the upper right.

segment.source: You don't have any teams set up. Teams determine which users have access to projects in your organization.
segment.target: You don't have any teams set up. Teams determine which users have access to projects in your organization.

segment.source: To create a new team, press the "Create Team" button in the upper right.
segment.target: To create a new team, press the "Create Team" button in the upper right.

segment.source: If you ever lose access to your codes, you can recover your account with your backup codes.
segment.target: If you ever lose access to your codes, you can recover your account with your backup codes.

segment.source: You have been invited to join so you can keep track of errors.
segment.target: You have been invited to join so you can keep track of errors.

segment.source: The account you're logged into is already a part of this organization. You might want to log out, then create an account for or log into the account that this invite link was intended for.
segment.target: The account you're logged into is already a part of this organization. You might want to log out, then create an account for or log into the account that this invite link was intended for.

segment.source: New version available. Load New Version?
segment.target: New version available. Load New Version?

segment.source: Members can view and act on events, as well as view most other data within the organization.
segment.target: Members can view and act on events, as well as view most other data within the organization.

segment.source: Admin privileges on any teams of which user is a member. They can create new teams and projects, as well as delete teams and projects they are already members of. Additionally, they can manage memberships of teams that they are members of.
segment.target: Admin privileges on any teams of which user is a member. They can create new teams and projects, as well as delete teams and projects they are already members of. Additionally, they can manage memberships of teams that they are members of.

segment.source: Gains admin access on all teams as well as the ability to add and remove members.
segment.target: Gains admin access on all teams as well as the ability to add and remove members.

segment.source: Unrestricted access to the organization, its data, and its settings. Can add, modify, and delete projects and members.
segment.target: Unrestricted access to the organization, its data, and its settings. Can add, modify, and delete projects and members.

segment.source: The account owner has access to the organization's GlitchTip subscription settings. If you are the current account owner or have an owner role, you may transfer ownership to this member.
segment.target: The account owner has access to the organization's GlitchTip subscription settings. If you are the current account owner or have an owner role, you may transfer ownership to this member.

segment.source: This member is the organization account owner and has access to the organization's GlitchTip subscription settings.
segment.target: This member is the organization account owner and has access to the organization's GlitchTip subscription settings.

segment.source: This user isn't on any teams.
segment.target: This user isn't on any teams.

segment.source: GlitchTip will "ping" the specified URL using an HTTP HEAD request with no payload.
segment.target: GlitchTip will "ping" the specified URL using an HTTP HEAD request with no payload.

segment.source: GlitchTip will send an HTTP POST request to the specified URL. If the expected response is not received, the site will be marked as Down.
segment.target: GlitchTip will send an HTTP POST request to the specified URL. If the expected response is not received, the site will be marked as Down.

segment.source: GlitchTip will send an HTTP GET request to the specified URL. If the expected response is not received, the site will be marked as Down.
segment.target: GlitchTip will send an HTTP GET request to the specified URL. If the expected response is not received, the site will be marked as Down.

segment.source: GlitchTip will await requests from your site to ensure it is active. If it doesn't receive the request, the site will be marked as Down.
segment.target: GlitchTip will await requests from your site to ensure it is active. If it doesn't receive the request, the site will be marked as Down.

segment.source: Enter a valid URL with protocol (ex. https://example.com)
segment.target: Enter a valid URL with protocol (ex. https://example.com)

segment.source: Uptime email notifications are sent to the team assigned to the associated project.
segment.target: Uptime email notifications are sent to the team assigned to the associated project.

segment.source: The quantity needs to be greater than or equal to 100.
segment.target: The quantity needs to be greater than or equal to 100.

segment.source: Time in seconds GlitchTip will wait for a response from your app. Defaults to 20 seconds.
segment.target: Time in seconds GlitchTip will wait for a response from your app. Defaults to 20 seconds.
